Articles.Content:
I was wondering if any one could help me make a support leg? I made the model but I cant figure out how to get it into the game. it would basically be a long wing that touches the ground and doesn't break easily

its my first model ever :

so feel free to make your own model if you dont think its good enough.

if you want the model just post what format you want

if it is made it would be good for helping with lift off or landing without a parachute

Wavenarra was talking about making legs in the chat earlier.

[21:58:22] <Wavenarra> Has anyone got any idea how the parachute deploys like it does?

[22:01:39] <Wavenarra> Oh, it's a special module

[22:01:49] <Wavenarra> I wanted to see if you could make deployable landing legs

[22:01:54] <Wavenarra> But I don't think its possible

[22:02:23] <Wavenarra> They'll have to stay deployed

[22:02:30] <Wavenarra> which will screw with a powered landing
can't you edit the drag on them though? make it like 0

If it's impossible at the moment to implement landing struts, how about support struts for the launchpad? Have them detach on the last (bottom) stage. This would really help stabilization for launch. I'm not aware of any rocket in history (even ancient Mongolian weapons) launching free-standing. They all have some sort of launch assistance whether it be a tower or a stick.
We have a tower, but it doesn't actually do anything yet.

We have a tower, but it doesn't actually do anything yet.

Besides destroying rockets if they don't lift off correctly...
oh my maybe the first mod of ksp...I must bow to you!

oh my maybe the first mod of ksp...I must bow to you!

You necroed a 2 year old thread. Are you wishing to get banned?
I thank the both of you for giving me a massive laughing fit. Now can some mod lock this please. Bury it deep this time.
Egads this is a necro from beyond the normal round of necros.

Please do not necro such old threads unless you have something interesting to bring, it just clutters up the forums. If you have questions about the mod, the best you can do is message the author

So yeah, thread closed.

Edit: dammit Odin

Edited August 3, 2013 by stupid_chris
